title: Gone Again
author: Johnstone, Doug
snippet: Eventually he was clear on Lothian Road and spotted the Lexus up ahead, then into Tollcross, round the Meadows and through Marchmont towards the Grange. On to Oswald Road and the Lexus turned into the driveway of a large villa, black stone recently cleaned and pointed. Hefty wooden kids' swing and slide set in the front garden.
